title: WTB: t206 Demmitt st louis low grade
author: g_vezina_c55

posts.post_title: WTB: t206 Demmitt st louis low grade
posts.post_content:
I am looking for a T206 Demmitt ST Louis variation, graded by SGC in low grade like SGC 10 or 20. 


LMK if you have this item for sale.
Thanks

[quote name="g_vezina_c55" post=1006425]I am looking for a T206 Demmitt ST Louis variation, graded by SGC in low grade like SGC 10 or 20. 


LMK if you have this item for sale.
Thanks[/QUOTE]

Nelson,

Weren't you just trying to sell your T206's a couple of days ago to fund a different project?? :confused:

Like i wrote in the sale thread thing changed yesterday, my other project will not happen, so i can keep my card lot and i am extremely happy with that. I listed my t206 cards for sale yesterday  with a  not happy face...

but now i can keep it and i am extremely happy with that !
No worries, Nelson. You wouldn't be the first to ask for help on the B/S/T to complete a set, complete it and then within days list it for sale. That's business as usual for some.

[quote name="g_vezina_c55" post=1006425]I am looking for a T206 Demmitt ST Louis variation, graded by SGC in low grade like SGC 10 or 20. 


LMK if you have this item for sale.
Thanks[/QUOTE]

Nelson, I have the one listed on ebay under 't206themonster'.

Nelson, I'm guessing you changed your mind on the Demmitt.  

Here's my Magie - is this the quality you are looking for, or do you need something lower?  I will be upgrading at some point, so if it fits your collecting goals we can talk.

Demmitt found. Thanks at Runscott. 

Impatient to have it in my mail box :)
